weekly picks (Apr 3 week 2024)

Posted on April 15, 2024 in 2024apr,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Apr 3rd week collection

  1. PhysRevX.14.021010 Quantum Electrodynamics in 2+1 Dimensions as the Organizing Principle of a Triangular Lattice Antiferromagnet (PRX)

  2. 63 Viewing a Quantum Spin Liquid through QED (Physics)

  3. PhysRevLett.132.166001 Feasible Route to High-Temperature Ambient-Pressure Hydride Superconductivity (PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.132.167301 Generating Minimal Training Sets for Machine Learned Potentials (PRL)

  5. 2404.08405 Unconventional superconducting diode effects via antisymmetry and antisymmetry breaking (arXiv)

  6. 2404.08122 Cavity engineered phonon-mediated superconductivity in MgB2 from first principles quantum electrodynamics (arXiv)

  7. 2404.08527 Spin-resolved nonlocal transport in proximitized Rashba nanowires (arXiv)

  8. 2404.08635 Transport properties in non-Fermi liquid phases of nodal-point semimetals (arXiv)

  9. 2404.08222 Quantum geometric tensor and the topological characterization of the extended Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model (arXiv)

  10. 2404.08099 Comparing quantum fluctuations in the spin-1/2 and spin-1 XXZ Heisenberg models on square and honeycomb lattices (arXiv)

  11. 2404.08067 High thermoelectric power factor through topological flat bands (arXiv)

  12. 2404.08153 Magnonic Thermal Machines (arXiv)

  13. 2404.08044 A Microscopic Perspective on Moire Materials (arXiv)

  14. 2404.08595 On the average spin Chern number (arXiv)

  15. 2404.08521 The magnetism measurements of the two-dimensional van der Waals antiferromagnet CrPS4 using dynamic cantilever magnetometry (arXiv)

  16. 2404.08467 Electron-phonon coupling induced topological phase transition in an alpha$-T3 Haldane-Holstein model (arXiv)

  17. 2404.08300 Topological insulators based on p-wave altermagnets, electrical control and detection of the altermagnetic domain wall (arXiv)

  18. 2404.08177 Magnetic properties of low-angle twisted bilayer graphene at three-quarters filling (arXiv)
